txt.en: 'Hullo! Would you like to be an \qAcquaintance\q of the Riders of Stangard? Well look no further! Completion of this quest should do that just for you.\n\n'If this sounds good to you, speak to me again!'
'Alright, soon the Riders of Stangard will consider you an Acquaintance. Ready?'
Great River - Riders of Stangard I
Talk to the friendly rep Man to continue
By completing this quest, you will be considered an Acquaintance of the Riders of Stangard.
